stance_1: I am aware fake meat sounds unappealing
stance_2: I enjoy many types of meat
justification: A strong enjoyment of many types of meat plausibly supports finding fake meat unappealing, as stated by the interviewee.

stance_2: I enjoy many types of meat

stance_2: I try to get enough protein each day
